hyperr8 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Car simulation

    generate_car_simulation.Rd

    This will generate a data frame with simulated car data of speed, distance, and time. By default, it will have 1000 rows representing 1000 cars. Each car will have a simulated driving time and a simulated driving speed. The driving time and driving speed will be correlated. The correlation will be 0.99 by default.

    generate_car_simulation(
  mean_driving_time = 3,
  mean_driving_speed = 70,
  sd_driving_time = 0.2,
  sd_driving_speed = 30,
  cor_driving = 0.99,
  n = 1000
)

    Arguments

    mean_driving_time

    The mean driving time for all cars.

    mean_driving_speed

    The mean driving speed for all cars.

    sd_driving_time

    The standard deviation of the driving time for the cars.

    sd_driving_speed

    The standard deviation of the driving speed for the cars.

    cor_driving

    The correlation between driving time and driving speed.

    n

    The number of cars to simulate.

    Value

    A data frame with simulated car data.

    Examples

    library(hyperr8)
car_data <- generate_car_simulation()

# Original data
plot(car_data$time, car_data$distance, pch=".", col=rgb(0,0,0,0.2))


# Estimated speed
plot(car_data$time, car_data$rate, pch=".", col=rgb(0,0,0,0.2))


# Log-log estimated speed
plot(car_data$time, car_data$rate, pch=".", col=rgb(0,0,0,0.2), log="xy")
